name: Check air conditioning filters
notes: Replace or clean every 30 days during peak usage

name: Test smoke and carbon monoxide detectors
Clean gutters and downspouts
notes: Remove leaves and debris to prevent ice dams

name: Inspect roof for winter damage
notes: Look for loose or damaged shingles

name: Service lawn equipment
notes: Change oil, replace spark plugs, sharpen blades

name: Check exterior lighting
notes: Ensure all outdoor lights are working for safety

name: Clean dryer vents
notes: Remove lint buildup to prevent fires
